DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , control , double randomize , non-blinded , multicenter , investigator initiate , academic superiority trial compare optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) guide vs. angiography guide wire recrossing jailed side branch ( SB ) ( 1. randomization 1:1 ) ( superiority ) compare Medtronic Resolute Integrity Xience Prime stent strut apposition SB ostium ( 2. randomization 1:1 ) ( superiority ) . Acute primary endpoint 30 day clinical follow-up . Hypothesis : OCT guide wire recrossing bifurcation stenting result less malapposed strut segment face SB ostium . Secondary hypothesis : Treatment Medtronic Resolute Integrity stent result less malapposed strut bifurcation segment compare treatment Abbott Xience Prime stent .
DOC.brief_title: The Does Optical Coherence Tomography Optimize Revascularization ( DOCTOR ) Recross Study
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To assess ability OCT guide wire recrossing reduce stent strut malapposition kiss balloon dilatation . To compare stent strut apposition treatment two different stent design use guide strategy wire recrossing .
DOC.criteria: Stable unstable angina pectoris silent angina pectoris . De novo coronary bifurcation lesion `` LAD/diagonal '' , `` Cx/obtuse marginal '' , `` right coronary artery ( RCA ) posterior descend artery ( PDA ) /posterolateral branch '' `` leave main ( LM ) /Cx/LAD '' . All Medina class except Medina 0.0.1 . Diameter side branch ≥2.5 mm . Diameter stenosis > 50 % operator 's visual assessment Signed informed consent STelevation infarction within 48 hour . Side branch lesion length > 5 mm . Expected survival < 1 year Severe heart failure ( NYHA≥III ) Screatinine > 120 µmol/l . Allergy Contrast medium , Aspirin , Clopidogrel , Ticagrelor , Ticlopidine , Everolimus Zotarolimus .
